answers.answer: Omg u hv ur hands full how do u do it? Be strong I kno its so hard I hv 3 and #4 on the way but my boys are 5yrs apart.. I hope ur husband helps or family u hv to try and find some relax time tho for baby..gd luck pray on strength I do every day.

Thanks! He works 11am to 1am so hes really only around on weekends, how i manage is beyond me but they are my babies so i gotta push through for them. My kids are 11,5,&3 hope all goes well for you also!!

Since being put on bed rest, kids being out of school, and my fiance isn't able to be home because he works 14-16 hour days he has used some of our savings to hire help to clean and help out with the kids...I have never felt more useless and like such a burden in my life.

I'm sorry to hear that I have a 3 yr old son and I'm having my baby girl next Monday my son was born healthy as can b thank god!! Now my baby girl has a heart defect and is going to need surgry after in soooo scared because I want to work after but with her condition I don't know wat I'm going to do.. best of luck with ur new bundle of joy!!

question: Stay at home mom of 3, #4 is on the way 74 more days!! I have psd, preeclampsia and severe anemia, im told to rest ha jokes tough with 3 kids, my 5 year old has a tube in her stomach and my 3 year old is Autistic. How would you mommies handle this?
title: change is not my thing
